content:
Shuddhaagaaratthil skariyaa -poojaadhoopam vaykkumpoll
Eeredoothan vannevam-ariyichaan salsandesham.

Priya elishubaa petteedum-baalanu naamam yoohaanon
Yisraayelilavan mumpan-nalkumavan lokarkkimpam.

Nyaan chonnaaree sandesham-sandehichathu moolam nee.
Paithal vidartthum naallollam -meveedatte maunatthil.

Jaatham cheythonaakhyaanam -yoohaanonennaavollam
Ompathu maasam bandhithanaay-vaanaan; sarvveshaa! Sthothram.
